Criteria<T>
public class SqliteCriteria<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Criteria<T>

Constructor Detail

SqliteCriteria

public SqliteCriteria(SqliteSession session,
                      java.lang.Class<T> entityClass,
                      SqlBuilder sqlBuilder,
                      SqliteMapper mapper)
               throws InfinitumRuntimeException
Constructs a new SqliteCriteria.

Parameters:
session - the SqliteSession this SqliteCriteria is attached to
entityClass - the Class to create SqliteCriteria for
sqlBuilder - SqlBuilder for generating SQL statements
mapper - the SqliteMapper to use for Object mapping
Throws:
InfinitumRuntimeException - if entityClass is transient
